caption: In one room, there are several people. In another room, many people are sitting in front of computers, wearing headphones, and making various phone calls. There is also a person who appears to be in charge, dressed in black clothing. Many vehicles are driving on the road. On the screen, a waveform is displayed. There is a man on the side of a car making a phone call. In the room, there is another man on the phone. In the dark of night, a small boat appears, floating on the water. Messages continue to flash on the computer screen. Suddenly, a group of people gets out of a car. They arrive by the water's edge. A man is having a meal on a large office desk, with a group of people standing nearby.
